_sText:
Remastered and more detailed version of de_MkZk_Proto_v1.

Teams spawn outside, the time it takes to enter the house and reach the bombspots or walk around the area is balanced for both teams.
Attic and Basement are A and B.

Features a camera-monitor system and a tactical easteregg, there is a hint for it somewhere in the map.

Changes:

  • One more room to the top apartment +2nd balcony.
  • Put an ivy-trellis on the main building to have another access to the 2nd floor from outside.
  • Added a small shed + pool to the garden.
  • Created two entirely new areas, one backyard and added rooms and floors to another building to connect the garden with both streets to increase tactic-options.
  • And obviously added many props and sounds, changed some small things in several areas and made the whole thing more realistic.

Further versions are coming soon.

If there are things to fix or any ideas to improve it let me know in the comments.
